search.query:
| inputlookup df_rating_archive.csv | where asset_type="tactic" | rename DateReport as _time
| append [|inputlookup df_tactic_rating.csv | join type=left TacticID [| inputlookup df_tactic_detail.csv | fields TacticID Tactic]| eval _time = now() |rename Tactic as asset_name, TacticID as asset_id| eval asset_type="tactic"]
| stats sum(DetectionScore) as score, count(DetectionScore) as tactic_count by _time | eval score=round(score/(tactic_count*100),2)*100 | fields - tactic_count | timechart span=7d values(score) as score | eval score=mvindex(score, 0) | eval timeframe=relative_time(now(),"-90d") | where _time >= timeframe | fields - timeframe

| inputlookup df_rating_archive.csv | where asset_type="tactic" | rename DateReport as _time
| append [|inputlookup df_tactic_rating.csv | join type=left TacticID [| inputlookup df_tactic_detail.csv | fields TacticID Tactic]| eval _time = now() |rename Tactic as asset_name, TacticID as asset_id| eval asset_type="tactic"]
| stats sum(ResponseScore) as score, count(ResponseScore) as tactic_count by _time | eval score=round(score/(tactic_count*100),2)*100 | fields - tactic_count | timechart span=7d values(score) as score | eval score=mvindex(score, 0) | eval timeframe=relative_time(now(),"-90d") | where _time >= timeframe | fields - timeframe

| inputlookup df_rating_archive.csv | where asset_type="tactic" | rename DateReport as _time
| append [|inputlookup df_tactic_rating.csv | join type=left TacticID [| inputlookup df_tactic_detail.csv | fields TacticID Tactic]| eval _time = now() |rename Tactic as asset_name, TacticID as asset_id| eval asset_type="tactic"]
| stats sum(SophisticationScore) as score, count(SophisticationScore) as tactic_count by _time | eval score=round(score/(tactic_count*100),2)*100 | fields - tactic_count | timechart span=7d values(score) as score | eval score=mvindex(score, 0) | eval timeframe=relative_time(now(),"-90d") | where _time >= timeframe | fields - timeframe

|inputlookup df_tactic_rating.csv | stats count(TacticID) as current_count by DetectionRating DetectionScore
|join DetectionRating [ |inputlookup df_rating_archive.csv | eval current_time=relative_time(now(),"-7d") | eval previous_time=relative_time(now(),"-16d") | where asset_type="tactic" and DateReport >= previous_time and DateReport < current_time | dedup asset_id | stats count(asset_id) as previous_count by DetectionRating DetectionScore ]
| sort - DetectionScore |table DetectionRating, previous_count, current_count |rename current_count as Current previous_count as Previous DetectionRating as Rating

|inputlookup df_tactic_rating.csv | stats count(TacticID) as current_count by ResponseRating ResponseScore
|join ResponseRating [ |inputlookup df_rating_archive.csv | eval current_time=relative_time(now(),"-7d") | eval previous_time=relative_time(now(),"-16d") | where asset_type="tactic" and DateReport >= previous_time and DateReport < current_time | dedup asset_id | stats count(asset_id) as previous_count by ResponseRating ResponseScore ]
| sort - ResponseScore |table ResponseRating, previous_count, current_count |rename current_count as Current previous_count as Previous ResponseRating as Rating

chart.title: Attacker Experience Level - # of Attack Tactics

search.query:
|inputlookup df_tactic_rating.csv | stats count(TacticID) as current_count by SophisticationRating SophisticationScore
|join SophisticationRating [ |inputlookup df_rating_archive.csv | eval current_time=relative_time(now(),"-7d") | eval previous_time=relative_time(now(),"-16d") | where asset_type="tactic" and DateReport >= previous_time and DateReport < current_time | dedup asset_id | stats count(asset_id) as previous_count by SophisticationRating SophisticationScore ]
| sort - SophisticationScore |table SophisticationRating, previous_count, current_count |rename current_count as Current previous_count as Previous SophisticationRating as Rating

| inputlookup df_rating_archive.csv | where asset_type="tactic" | rename DateReport as _time | append [|inputlookup df_tactic_rating.csv | join type=left TacticID [| inputlookup df_tactic_detail.csv | fields TacticID Tactic]| eval _time = now() |rename Tactic as asset_name, TacticID as asset_id| eval asset_type="tactic"] | stats sum(SophisticationScore) as score_sophistication, count(SophisticationScore) as tactic_count by _time | eval score_sophistication=round(score_sophistication*100/(tactic_count*100),2) | fields - tactic_count | timechart span=7d values(score_sophistication) as score_sophistication | eval score_sophistication=coalesce(mvindex(score_sophistication, 1),mvindex(score_sophistication, 0)) | join _time[ | inputlookup df_rating_archive.csv | where asset_type="tactic" | rename DateReport as _time | append [|inputlookup df_tactic_rating.csv | join type=left TacticID [| inputlookup df_tactic_detail.csv | fields TacticID Tactic]| eval _time = now() |rename Tactic as asset_name, TacticID as asset_id| eval asset_type="tactic"] | stats sum(ResponseScore) as score_response, count(ResponseScore) as tactic_count by _time | eval score_response=round(score_response*100/(tactic_count*100),2) | fields - tactic_count | timechart span=7d values(score_response) as score_response | eval score_response=coalesce(mvindex(score_response, 1),mvindex(score_response, 0)) ] | join _time[ | inputlookup df_rating_archive.csv | where asset_type="tactic" | rename DateReport as _time | append [|inputlookup df_tactic_rating.csv | join type=left TacticID [| inputlookup df_tactic_detail.csv | fields TacticID Tactic]| eval _time = now() |rename Tactic as asset_name, TacticID as asset_id| eval asset_type="tactic"] | stats sum(DetectionScore) as score_detection, count(DetectionScore) as tactic_count by _time | eval score_detection=round(score_detection*100/(tactic_count*100),2) | fields - tactic_count | timechart span=7d values(score_detection) as score_detection | eval score_detection=coalesce(mvindex(score_detection, 1),mvindex(score_detection, 0)) ] | eval timeframe=relative_time(now(),"-180d") | where _time >= timeframe | fields - timeframe | rename score_sophistication as " Attacker Effort" score_response as "Attack Response" score_detection as "Attack Detection"

|inputlookup df_tactic_rating.csv | join TacticID[|inputlookup df_tactic_detail.csv] |where like(Category,"%Discovery%") |eval category_test="Discovery" |append [|inputlookup df_tactic_rating.csv | join TacticID[|inputlookup df_tactic_detail.csv] |where like(Category,"%Execution%") |eval category_test="Execution"] |append [|inputlookup df_tactic_rating.csv | join TacticID[|inputlookup df_tactic_detail.csv] |where like(Category,"%Persistence%") |eval category_test="Persistence"] |append [|inputlookup df_tactic_rating.csv | join TacticID[|inputlookup df_tactic_detail.csv] |where like(Category,"%Privilege Escalation%") |eval category_test="Privilege Escalation"] |append [|inputlookup df_tactic_rating.csv | join TacticID[|inputlookup df_tactic_detail.csv] |where like(Category,"%Defense Evasion%") |eval category_test="Defense Evasion"] |append [|inputlookup df_tactic_rating.csv | join TacticID[|inputlookup df_tactic_detail.csv] |where like(Category,"%Credential Access%") |eval category_test="Credential Access"] |append [|inputlookup df_tactic_rating.csv | join TacticID[|inputlookup df_tactic_detail.csv] |where like(Category,"%Lateral Movement%") |eval category_test="Lateral Movement"] |append [|inputlookup df_tactic_rating.csv | join TacticID[|inputlookup df_tactic_detail.csv] |where like(Category,"%Collection%") |eval category_test="Collection"] |append [|inputlookup df_tactic_rating.csv | join TacticID[|inputlookup df_tactic_detail.csv] |where like(Category,"%Exfiltration%") |eval category_test="Exfiltration"] |append [|inputlookup df_tactic_rating.csv | join TacticID[|inputlookup df_tactic_detail.csv] |where like(Category,"%Command and Control%") |eval category_test="Command and Control"] |stats sum(DetectionScore) as score_detection, sum(ResponseScore) as score_response, sum(SophisticationScore) as score_sophistication, count(DetectionScore) as tactic_count by category_test |eval score_composite = score_detection + score_response +score_sophistication | eval score_composite=round(score_composite*100/(tactic_count*300)) |rename score_composite as current_score | fields category_test current_score |join category_test[ |inputlookup df_rating_archive.csv | eval current_time=relative_time(now(),"-7d") | eval previous_time=relative_time(now(),"-16d") | where asset_type="tactic" and DateReport >= previous_time and DateReport < current_time |rename asset_id as TacticID | join TacticID[|inputlookup df_tactic_detail.csv] |where like(Category,"%Discovery%") |eval category_test="Discovery" |append[|inputlookup df_rating_archive.csv | eval current_time=relative_time(now(),"-7d") | eval previous_time=relative_time(now(),"-16d") | where asset_type="tactic" and DateReport >= previous_time and DateReport < current_time |rename asset_id as TacticID | join TacticID[|inputlookup df_tactic_detail.csv] |where like(Category,"%Execution%") |eval category_test="Execution"] |append[|inputlookup df_rating_archive.csv | eval current_time=relative_time(now(),"-7d") | eval previous_time=relative_time(now(),"-16d") | where asset_type="tactic" and DateReport >= previous_time and DateReport < current_time |rename asset_id as TacticID | join TacticID[|inputlookup df_tactic_detail.csv] |where like(Category,"%Persistence%") |eval category_test="Persistence"] |append[|inputlookup df_rating_archive.csv | eval current_time=relative_time(now(),"-7d") | eval previous_time=relative_time(now(),"-16d") | where asset_type="tactic" and DateReport >= previous_time and DateReport < current_time|rename asset_id as TacticID | join TacticID[|inputlookup df_tactic_detail.csv] |where like(Category,"%Privilege Escalation%") |eval category_test="Privilege Escalation"] |append[|inputlookup df_rating_archive.csv | eval current_time=relative_time(now(),"-7d") | eval previous_time=relative_time(now(),"-16d") | where asset_type="tactic" and DateReport >= previous_time and DateReport < current_time |rename asset_id as TacticID | join TacticID[|inputlookup df_tactic_detail.csv] |where like(Category,"%Defense Evasion%") |eval category_test="Defense Evasion"] |append[|inputlookup df_rating_archive.csv | eval current_time=relative_time(now(),"-7d") | eval previous_time=relative_time(now(),"-16d") | where asset_type="tactic" and DateReport >= previous_time and DateReport < current_time |rename asset_id as TacticID | join TacticID[|inputlookup df_tactic_detail.csv] |where like(Category,"%Credential Access%") |eval category_test="Credential Access"] |append[|inputlookup df_rating_archive.csv | eval current_time=relative_time(now(),"-7d") | eval previous_time=relative_time(now(),"-16d") | where asset_type="tactic" and DateReport >= previous_time and DateReport < current_time|rename asset_id as TacticID | join TacticID[|inputlookup df_tactic_detail.csv] |where like(Category,"%Lateral Movement%") |eval category_test="Lateral Movement"] |append[|inputlookup df_rating_archive.csv | eval current_time=relative_time(now(),"-7d") | eval previous_time=relative_time(now(),"-16d") | where asset_type="tactic" and DateReport >= previous_time and DateReport < current_time |rename asset_id as TacticID | join TacticID[|inputlookup df_tactic_detail.csv] |where like(Category,"%Collection%") |eval category_test="Collection"] |append[|inputlookup df_rating_archive.csv | eval current_time=relative_time(now(),"-7d") | eval previous_time=relative_time(now(),"-16d") | where asset_type="tactic" and DateReport >= previous_time and DateReport < current_time |rename asset_id as TacticID | join TacticID[|inputlookup df_tactic_detail.csv] |where like(Category,"%Exfiltration%") |eval category_test="Exfiltration"] |append[|inputlookup df_rating_archive.csv | eval current_time=relative_time(now(),"-7d") | eval previous_time=relative_time(now(),"-16d") | where asset_type="tactic" and DateReport >= previous_time and DateReport < current_time|rename asset_id as TacticID | join TacticID[|inputlookup df_tactic_detail.csv] |where like(Category,"%Command and Control%") |eval category_test="Command and Control"] |stats sum(DetectionScore) as score_detection, sum(ResponseScore) as score_response, sum(SophisticationScore) as score_sophistication, count(DetectionScore) as tactic_count by category_test DateReport |eval score_composite = score_detection + score_response +score_sophistication | eval score_composite=round(score_composite*100/(tactic_count*300)) |rename score_composite as previous_score | fields category_test previous_score ] | table category_test previous_score current_score | rename previous_score as " Previous" current_score as "Current" category_test as Category

| inputlookup df_attack_detail.csv | eval dateadded_epoch = strptime(DateAdded, "%Y-%m-%d")
| eval timeframe=relative_time(now(),"-180d") | where dateadded_epoch>= timeframe | fields - timeframe dateadded_epoch
| table DateAdded AttackName Origin | sort - DateAdded

table.title: Attack Profile Tactic Usage - Last 6 Months

search.query:
| inputlookup df_attack_detail.csv | eval dateadded_epoch = strptime(DateAdded, "%Y-%m-%d")
| eval timeframe=relative_time(now(),"-180d") | where dateadded_epoch>= timeframe | fields - timeframe dateadded_epoch
| makemv delim=" " TacticsInvolved | rename TacticsInvolved as TacticID | stats count by TacticID | join TacticID[ |inputlookup df_tactic_detail.csv| fields TacticID Tactic]
| rename count as Attacks
| table Tactic Attacks | sort - Attacks
